website_summaries.verdict: The same quality you would expect from Speedo, designed for younger swimmers. And because it's foam, it shouldn't hurt anyone if practice time turns into playtime.
pros: Side finger scallops promote proper hand position
Underside finger grooves for easy gripping
Textured EVA foam creates a non-slick surface
Good for starting out on the swim team or just learning how to swim
cons: Not as stable as larger boards, but that's because of the smaller size

customer_reviews.title: Not as buoyant
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these, since my son (3years old) used similar ones in swim class. In swim class, the kickboard stayed above water. These end up under the water by a couple of inches. We kept it, as the boys like to use it in the pool. But, not as buoyant as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn.amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: to light??
customer_reviews.text: i need two of this for the kid... it's either too small or too light. its not strong enough to float on the water for the kid.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Oh

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: These last forever and are extremely durable. Used for swim team and they hold up to daily use, abuse, sunshine, etc. The gym has a stack of them that all the kids use and my sons brand new board was hard to pick out of the stack. You will have to write your name on it so it doesn’t get mixed up with another’s.
customer_reviews.author: Sammyyantha

customer_reviews.title: Great for swim practice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality board for any young swimmer. My 5 and 8 year olds use it at swim practice 4 times a week for already 3 years and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sona B.

customer_reviews.title: I teach in home swim lessons and this is perfect for the smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: I teach in home swim lessons and this is perfect for the smaller kids. Only down side is that it isn't as sturdy on the top of the water because it is smaller--it is more likely to tip with kids that aren't as balanced or strong with their kicks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Brasuell

customer_reviews.title: Not what was pictured and is small
customer_reviews.text: This one pictured was not what we received. The one we got was dark blue and no white writing on it. It is also very small- not sure its actually youth size and not kids size. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: works great with my 5 year old who is on a swim team. She uses this at practice
customer_reviews.author: bobbie bell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This kickboard is good quality. We bought it for our daughter and she enjoys using it
customer_reviews.author: Alexandr Ter

customer_reviews.title: Great for Little Ones Learning to Swim
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size for smaller children. My five year old is learning to swim, and this is the perfect size for him to work on becoming more comfortable in the water and improving his skills. The grooves on the side are helpful for finger placement and grip. Great product and is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Return these are very small. For little kids is right. There very small...
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Fine but sized for small, young kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a very petite 13 year old, but it's much too small for her. This is for little kids. Otherwise it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves the water and swims free style pretty well but needed some work on his kick
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves the water and swims free style pretty well but needed some work on his kick. This was perfect to help him to focus on just that.
customer_reviews.author: Moon 2 Dance 2

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping little ones who are learning to swim
customer_reviews.text: Item is as pictured. Great for helping little ones who are learning to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: Love this one! My 9 year old used this for his swim team all summer. Added benefit, is that his name did not come off the entire summer! (While his sister's name came off 3 times of a different kind of kickboard.) We wrote on the white part in sharpie.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah & Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended buy a swim instructor.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a child who needs to condition their legs. Easy use and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Perkins-smith

customer_reviews.title: Good for Young Swimming team player
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality kickbord. I bought the Junior size for my son to start his swimming team.
customer_reviews.author: family father

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the dimensions aren’t listed in the details. This is too small for grade schoolers.
customer_reviews.author: C123

customer_reviews.title: this is a good quality
customer_reviews.text: the kickbord size is just right for small kids. this is a good quality kickbord
customer_reviews.author: hll

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Small board, not sufficient enough to support 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: ravi

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Great to use for building up leg strength while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is using this, even the adults. Keeps us afloat and seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and an excellent tool for teaching new swimmers.
customer_reviews.author: jennythomas76

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: a bit smaller than expected but I use it almost every day
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good. My 6-year-old son loves it
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. My 6-year-old son loves it. Glad I got a kid-size kick board rather than a normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Claire H

customer_reviews.title: Kid-Sized
customer_reviews.text: Well I was looking for an adult board and purchased this one by mistake. It is good quality, firm and perfectly sized for kids from 4-10 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: AReview

customer_reviews.title: IT FLOATS!
customer_reviews.text: The kids kicked their little hearts out, no one drowned. It was a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Kick board junior.
customer_reviews.text: Not the color i ordered, however the board fits my needs. Thank you for fast service and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, and by the smile on her face I would say that it meets her expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The small size makes it easy to carry, and it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Well this thing is small, too small for my 5-year old, it sinks under his weight (37 lbs) and he quickly falls off it. Plus it is very stiff and hard. Too bad I can't return it. Going to get a foam adult kick board for him instead.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy G Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: He is on a professional team for kids and so far so good. We are happy with this
customer_reviews.text: My son has used this for a few months for practice. He is on a professional team for kids and so far so good. We are happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: everydaynormalgirl

product_meta.title: Speedo Junior Swim Kickboard
product_meta.description: For generations Speedo has been synonymous with comfort, quality, and the fastest racing suits on earth. From their humble beginnings in Australia to the global domination of the racing world we see today, Speedo has always put quality before all else. The Speedo Aqualab team has recently won awards for their patented Fastskin material modeled after the skin of a shark. Speedo has since expanded from exclusively crafting racing suits, to now providing beginner, junior, and lifeguard lines for all skill levels. The Speedo name can be found on a wide variety of suits for men, women and children. Speedo also offers a wide range of sportswear, footwear and accessories, some of which include goggles, fins, training tools, and water-shoes. Regardless of your needs, Speedo will help maximize your swim!
feature_bullets: Ideal for kicking drills and improving leg strength
Side finger scallops promote proper hand position
Textured EVA foam creates a non-slick surface
